example.eg: Christianity gradually spread across Europe.  The fire spread throughout the house.
example.egtrans: 基督教最终传遍整个欧洲。

example.eg: His thirst for knowledge spreads to philosophy and even mathematics.
example.egtrans: 他的求知欲延伸到了哲学甚至数学领域。

example.eg: Infected animals spread disease across the country.
example.egtrans: 感染了病毒的动物把疾病传播到了全国各地。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 传播, 散播, 传染

example.eg: The peacock spread his tail.
example.egtrans: 孔雀开屏。

example.eg: Her mother spread her arms wide to welcome her home.
example.egtrans: 她妈妈张开双臂，欢迎她回家。

example.eg: I can't find a knife to spread this peanut butter.
example.egtrans: 我找不到小刀来涂抹花生酱。

example.eg: He spread butter on the toast.
example.egtrans: 他把黄油涂抹在面包上。

example.eg: She spread the shirt across the ironing board.
example.egtrans: 她把衬衣铺在熨衣板上。

example.eg: Historians study the spread of Christianity.
example.egtrans: 历史学家研究了基督教的传播。

example.eg: The spread of the branches covered the garden with shade.
example.egtrans: 伸展出的树枝给花园罩上了一层阴影。

example.eg: You've got a nice spread here.
example.egtrans: 你这个大宅子真不错。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 大房子，占地宽广的房子，大宅子

example.eg: They had to buy a new spread for the table.
example.egtrans: 他们得去给桌子购置一张新桌布。

example.eg: The spread on their bed matched the drapes.
That stock is not traded much, so there is a large spread.
example.egtrans: 那只股票的交易量较小，所以差价巨大。

example.eg: Mother set out a delicious spread for Christmas dinner.
example.egtrans: 妈妈为圣诞晚宴摆好了一桌盛餐。

example.eg: Mick puts cheese spread on his crackers.
example.egtrans: 米克将奶酪面包酱涂在饼干上。

example.eg: This butterfly's wings have a spread of ten inches.
example.egtrans: 这只蝴蝶的两翅长度是10英寸。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 两翼长度，两翅长度, 翼展

example.eg: I refuse to use that tasteless spread; I will only eat real butter.
example.egtrans: 我不要吃那种没什么味道的酱，我只要真正的黄油。

example.eg: This magazine has a spread about my favourite actor.
example.egtrans: 这本杂志有对页是关于我喜欢的男演员的。

example.eg: The water spread over the entire floor.
example.egtrans: 水淌了满满一地。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 散布到，覆盖到，伸到，延及

example.eg: The mountains spread to the sea.
example.egtrans: 群山绵延，直至汪洋大海。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扩展, 延长, 绵延

example.eg: Margarine spreads more easily than butter.
example.egtrans: 人造黄油比黄油更容易被涂开。

example.eg: The virus spread through the school.
The coach spread the players across the field.
First, spread the paint over the area.
It's important to spread the wealth.
My father is spreading seeds in the garden.
The cat spreads out on the blanket like a lion in the sun.
example.egtrans: 那只猫像太阳底下的狮子一般四肢摊开躺在毛毯上。

example.eg: Nutella is a popular chocolate spread.
The lockdown started after the health department detected community spread of the virus.

dsense.name: lay on a spread, put on a spread

trans_examp.trans_cn: 准备丰盛大餐, 准备宴席

example.eg: The torture victim was laid out spread-eagle on the table.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 手脚伸展的，四肢张开的

example.eg: Spread your fingers out as wide as you can.
example.egtrans: 尽量张开你的手指。

example.eg: The players spread out.
example.egtrans: 队员们分散开来。

example.eg: Let's spread out so we can cover a larger area. We don't have much time.
example.egtrans: 让我们分头搜索，这样搜索范围更广。毕竟我们时间不多了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 分头搜索, 分散搜索

example.eg: Where I live, people's houses are so spread out that we never hear our neighbors.
example.egtrans: 在我住的地方，街坊四邻的房子都很分散，所以我们从来听不见彼此的声音。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 疏疏落落的，分散的，散开的

example.eg: Max was sleeping with his legs spread out on the huge bed.
example.egtrans: 马克思双腿张开，在床上睡觉。

example.eg: Natasha's body was spread out on the couch in deep sleep.
example.egtrans: 娜塔莎四肢张开躺在沙发上，睡得很熟。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 散布消息, 传播消息

dsense.name: spread your wings
dsense.guideword: figurative (do [sth] more ambitious) (比喻有巨大的发展)
